I/We hereby certify that my /our Registration Certificate under Maharashtra Value Added Tax Act, 2002, is in force on the date on which the sale of goods specified in this Tax Invoice is made by me /us and the transaction of sale covered by this tax invoice has been effected by me/us and it shall be accounted for in the turnover of sales while filing of return and due tax, if any, payable on the sale, has been paid or shall be paid.
The Goods are dispatched subject to your acceptance. Please acknowledge receipt of the goods
For Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited
Receiver's Signature Stamp
Regd Office: Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited, Eucharistic Congress Bldg. No. 2, 3rd Floor, 5 Convent Street, Colaba, Mumbai 400001.
